rows.label: qst200310_msg0003
rows.name:
It suddenly grabbed me and
carried me up onto the roof!

rows.label: qst200310_msg0004
rows.name: I really thought I was going to die.

rows.label: qst200310_msg0005
rows.name:
I wasn't particularly hurt,
so I'm alright, but...

rows.label: qst200310_msg0006
rows.name:
Come to think of it, for all
that commotion, not a single
person was injured, were they?

rows.label: qst200310_msg0007
rows.name:
Yes, and the buildings
weren't that damaged either.

rows.label: qst200310_msg0008
rows.name: It was truly a blessing in disguise.

rows.label: qst200310_msg0009
rows.name:
In any case, please get rid of
that monster as soon as you can!
